reviews.review: To be fair, I only bought this game only because of Chell; she's really cute. But this game is fun still- unless you're dumb like me being stuck on a stage, but fun.

What the shit Valve. I have tried nearly every workaround Ive found for over 2 hours. Support thus far has been brainless.
Im new to valves games and wanted to try Portal 2  (yes everything is legit no piracy).
Thats never going to happen.

Game crashes on start. No error codes, no persistent app hangs or windows, no message whatsoever.
Tried verify integrity and turned off in-game overlay
Tried restarting PC.
Tried msconfig-disable all background services-restart to no avail.
Tried compatibility.
Tried run as admin.
Tried big picture mode.
Tried restart and go offline then again back to online workaround.
Tried McAfee real time exception and turned off firewall.
Tried putting -dxlevel 90 in the launch options as well as -safe and -autoconfig
Tried launching from desktop shortcut, steam, and .exe in local files.
Tried moving the game folder (thru steams button) from F to C. It did produce a window with different behavior but still no launch.
Tried launching without MSI afterburner in background (caused constant crash with mudrunner for me dont ask how idk)
Tried sacrificing a lamb to the cult god Gaben.

Nothing has worked.
Steam up to date.
win10 PRO 64bit. Up to date.
ryzen 2600
16GB ram @3000
SSD
GTX1070 Driver is up to date.

RESOLVED!
MSI after burner and or riva tuner statics server were the cause. Even though I tried earlier in the beginning closing the app..
Story took me 8 hours to do but I loved it. cant tell this is a decade old. Man now I understand why so many people give praise to valve. except when it comes to counting.
jo ne geiles spiel kann ich nur weiter empfehlen

Im pretty late to the portal party but bought the game so i can experience this gaming classic with the portal 1 and 2 pack and honnestly i recommend it a lot. Its a really funny game with the puzzles done with portals, some rooms are pretty hard but when you figure it out you feel achieved.
il est top mais mieux en multi
Nice story, i finished this game two times and it's still really good.

This game is 10 years old and is still better than most games today, i can't believe how good this game looks for its age, the storytelling is amazing, the voice acting is good, the levels are very well made and fun to play, everything about this game is amazing, Valve just CANNOT make a bad game, wish they could make more sequels to games though
A very funny game with interesting mechanics.

The Portal Saga is still one of my favorites.
I'd recommend any gamer to give both games a try and go through the single player at least once.
Portal 2 Co-Op mode is also good and I also recommend playing it with a friend for the best experience.

This is great mind game.
Where u have to solve puzzle in a 3D interactive world including portals to travel, reach places and many other interactions to sovle a puzzle.
There is CO-OP 2 persons.
This game is funny with great lighting and sound effects. 10/10
